articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: 推荐：一文介绍“递归铭文”（作者：@Darren_web3）递归铭文即铭文之间可以引用彼此的内容，实现了超越 Gbrc721 的功能，这个创新直接在链上实现，无需依赖链下解析。本文将以形象化的方式从起源、实现方式及程度，以及可能的影响和可能存在的风险四个角度对递归铭文进行深入剖析。

articles.description:
这所好像是换了批人。

元宇宙阿Q: 抹茶交易所是真狗，奉劝所有想上、准备上抹茶交易所的项目方，如果真心是为了用户、项目前景考虑的话，千万不要上抹茶，至少现阶段不考虑，现在是各个交易所都很缺钱，但凡一上抹茶就是让自己用户去接抹茶的砸盘，项目方给了的币要砸，项目方不给的币用数据也要砸，不做市？不好意思，不做市不开充提。
articles.title: 这所好像是换了批人。

追着官方人员反馈了几次，后来居然用中文回复我： 开发人员比较忙回头再修。 🤣🤣
靠，原来是个国人盘。

articles.description:
RT Justin Slaughter
So, I respectfully disagree with Noelle on this one. I think BlackRock is doing this on the merits (seeking to get a bitcoin ETF approved) rather than trying to send a political message. 
Bear with me, because this is complicated in terms of Democratic politics. https://twitter.com/noelleinmadrid/status/1669624250804600832

Noelle Acheson: My take on the BlackRock BTC ETF filing:
- **BIG** news - BlackRock is the world's largest asset manager
- It’s not going to happen
- BlackRock knows this
- Rather, it is sending a political message
- Larry Fink is a prominent Democrat
https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/06/15/blackrocks-ishares-files-paperwork-for-spot-bitcoin-etf/

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Just about only cautious tweet on an otherwise euphoric timeline hmmm

CrediBULL Crypto: We have hit the "danger zone" on aggregate OI with this pump- 10B. Read the original post below for more context.
At some point, this 10B level will no longer serve as a top- during strong trending bull markets we can expect leverage to increase and this number to no longer cap… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1671238408407232513 https://t.co/QmNW3vEiDa
articles.title: Just about only cautious tweet on an otherwise euphoric timeline hmmm

There was a massive evolutionary bottleneck in human history. on the female side nothing happened, but for every 17 women that reproduced, only one man did.
This was the invention of war, and the martial spirit.
